<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Undying Conviction](/Feats.aspx?ID=3483) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 33</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
able to create or control [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160); [cleric](/Classes.aspx?ID=5) with a negative font, [oracle](/Classes.aspx?ID=14) of [bones](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=3), or [necromancer](/ArcaneSchools.aspx?ID=7) [wizard](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

Your presence has a bolstering effect on your undead [minions](/Traits.aspx?ID=109). Undead creatures under your control and within a 30-foot emanation around you gain a +2 status bonus to saving throws to resist [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) damage and to Will saving throws to resist effects that would make them [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6).

**Special** This feat has the trait matching your spellcasting tradition.
